sourcesContent:
import dataList from '../assets/data.json'; // Individual card component that displays a weapon's picture and stats export default function WeaponCard({ weapon }) { let imglink = "./images/weapons/" + weapon.name + ".png"; let weppowerbonus = (weapon.power_bonus * 100) + "%"; let attrbonus = (weapon.attr_bonus * 100) + "%"; let cheese_effect = (dataList.freshness[(weapon.cheese_effect + 6)]); let title_req = (dataList.title_req[weapon.title_req - 1]); let wiki_link = "https://mhwiki.hitgrab.com/wiki/index.php/" + weapon.name; let limited; weapon.limited ? limited = "Yes" : limited = "No"; return ( <>

{weapon.name}

{weapon.power_type}

Power

{weapon.power}

Power Bonus

{weppowerbonus}

Attraction
Bonus

{attrbonus}

Luck

{weapon.luck}

Cheese effect

{cheese_effect}

Title Required

{title_req}

Limited Edition

{limited}

) }
